      Constructor.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(Action action)
      Execute an action. Internally, the action is dispatched to the correct listener based on the action's caller identity.
      Parameters:
      action - the action to dispatch

    • registerNewListener

      public void registerNewListener(Listener listener)
      Register a new listener. If the identity of the listener is already present in the server, the listener is registered to the correct game or lobby. Otherwise, a new lobby is created and the listener is registered to it.
      Specified by:
      registerNewListener in class Dispatcher
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to register

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener(Listener listener)
      Remove a listener.
      Specified by:
      removeListener in class Dispatcher
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to remove

    • migrateLobbyToGame

      private void migrateLobbyToGame(Lobby lobby)
      Migrate a lobby to a new game.
      Parameters:
      lobby - the lobby to migrate

    • migrateToExistingLobby

      private Boolean migrateToExistingLobby(Listener listener, String nickname, UUID lobbyId, Pawn playerPawn)
      Migrate a listener attached to the general matchmaking to an existing lobby.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to migrate
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      lobbyId - the id of the lobby to migrate to
      playerPawn - the pawn of the player

    • reconnectToGame

      private Boolean reconnectToGame(Listener listener, String nickname)

    • migrateToLobby

      private void migrateToLobby(Listener listener, String firstPlayerNickname, Pawn playerPawn)
      Migrate a listener attached to the general matchmaking to a new lobby.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to migrate
      firstPlayerNickname - the nickname of the first player
      playerPawn - the pawn of the player

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Cleanup the dispatcher, removing ended games and the corresponding controllers.
